# Reduce Person, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[3rd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 3]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (a pinch of powdered iron)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One humanoid creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 331

This spell functions like *[[Reduce Person (Spell)|reduce person]]*, except that it affects multiple creatures.
